data.persona: I am better and smarter than a raven. I see more than he. I know so much.
data.description:
You are in the bone pit.
Grungy and damp, a hole in the ground filled with remains of the fallen. A pungent odor rises from the opening, warding off anyone nearing the area. Ivory spikes with brownish red tips line the outside of the pit.
There's a fire pit, a remains, a moss, a mud, a spike, and a rock here.
The juror and the worms are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am turning over the mud to scavenge for food
data.mid_motivation: I must find food soon to quell my hunger
data.long_motivation: I need energy in my wings to carry me in the flight from place to place for later journeys
